name: TransitorDrive
0:
”Alexa, open Transit or Drive”
”Alexa, ask Transit or Drive what is the fastest way to get to Newark Airport”
”Should I drive or take public transit to get to 1600 Pennsylvania Ave NW Washington, DC”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: transit or drive
des: Getting ready to leave for the airport and want to know if you should drive or take public transportation? This is the skill for you. Once you grant location access to this skill, all you have to do is say: Alexa, ask Transit or Drive what's the fastest way to Oakland Airport. The skill uses the Google Maps API to get current traffic conditions and public transportation timetables and recommends which mode to take, including a time estimate for each.
